chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
I'd rather buy a new one 

Thank you,

Hello ecomobile, 

The client is contacting us because you have received the package for a withdrawal on 24/05/24. We remind you that the period to reimburse is 48 working hours in the case of a withdrawal. If you have not reimbursed the customer before 28/05/24, we will reimburse the order.

Thank you in advance for your attention,
Jose Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have received the device. We will proceed with the necessary action soon. In the meantime, please do NOT refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile 

I am waiting for you to proceed with the request for reimbursement to the customer within the established period.

Regards,
Jose from the Back Care Team
